channel.title: Need Help With VPS's
channel.description: hey guys im new to this whole rsps hosting thing, and i really wanted a VPS so i dont need laptop on 24/7. I have a windows 7 laptop and that all i know about it, i am also looking for a coder so pm if interested. Thank you for your time :)

item.title: Need Help With VPS's
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

aciraccar:

Vps Cost Money but you can find cheap ones around 15$ a month for a average Vps just make sure you dont get a really crappy one XD

I’m not sure of a VPS company that provides GOOD services for $15 a month. Cheapest I’ve seen them are in the $21-$25 range, with minimum specs. Unless of course, you’re talking of a Linux based OS? Anyways, @OP as people have said, just Google it. I’d recommend myhosting.com

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With VPS's
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

[quote=“luna-scape, post:3, topic:478659”][quote author=RB Server link=topic=596884.msg4203034#msg4203034 date=1358503447]
hey guys im new to this whole rsps hosting thing, and i really wanted a VPS so i dont need laptop on 24/7.
I have a windows 7 laptop and that all i know about it, i am also looking for a coder so pm if interested. Thank you for your time
[/quote]
Mygod stop posting and i help you.
Check my skype name in my signature[/quote] Your posts are irrelevant. Stop posting, you’re a spammer, and now everyone knows how you got your seniority. There’s something called a “Private Message”. Talk to him through there.

OT : Spend some time researching vps companies. I’ve never used one so I can’t recommend one, but they shouldn’t be hard to find. Just search " Runescape Private Server Virtual Private Servers"

Read full topic
